name: mintlify-tsdocs
description: Generate Mintlify-compatible MDX documentation from TypeScript. Also published as 'mint-ts' for convenience.

scripts.build: tsc && cp -r src/schemas lib/ && cp -r src/components lib/
scripts.rebuild: bun run clean && bun run build
scripts.docs:generate: node ./bin/mintlify-tsdocs generate --tab-name Reference --group 'Code API' --menu --readme -o docs/reference --docs-json docs/docs.json --skip-extractor -i docs/reference
scripts.docs:verbose: bun run build && node ./bin/mintlify-tsdocs generate --tab-name Reference --group 'Code API' --menu --readme -o docs/reference --docs-json docs/docs.json
